page.title: 15RIVERS HALL
page.content: { RIVERS HALL Rivers Hall is a very old, large country house. There are over twelve rooms and they are all filled with very old furniture and expensive paintings. The oldest parts of the house are the cellars, which date back to Roman times.The house that Mr. Minter lives in now was built in 1713. The original house was burnt down and rebuilt again 3 times. The house has a ghost it is called the Grey Lady and she wears a green fur. There have been many owners of Rivers Hall in the past including Mr. Minter's mother and father. Mr.Minter owns 1700 acres, 1100 for farming, 200 for grazing and 400 for other use. The grounds of Rivers Hall are very big. There are great walled gardens and gigantic trees. Rivers Hall is a lovely place.
